ability.Muddy Secretion: On switch-in, other Pokemon have their speed multiplied by 0.7.
ability.Soil Absorption: This Pokemon recovers 1/8th of its maximum HP if it hits a foe with a Ground-type move.

Mud Wave.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Mud Wall.effect: Creates a wall of mud that halves the damage of all Special moves for 5 turns.

Golden Mire.effect: Has a 20% chance to trap the target in mud for 2-5 turns, dealing damage of 1/16 of its maximum HP each end of turn.
